api_add_prepay.name: api_add_prepay
api_add_prepay.description:
Adds a PrePay into the system under the given module.    PrePays are a credit on
* your account by prefilling  your account with funds.   These are stored in a
* PrePay.    PrePay funds can be automatically used as needed or set to only be
* usable by direct action

function.name: api_add_prepay
function.desc: Adds a PrePay into the system under the given module.    PrePays are a credit on your account by prefilling  your account with funds.   These are stored in a PrePay.    PrePay funds can be automatically used as needed or set to only be usable by direct action

sid.name: sid
sid.description: the *Session ID* you get from the [login](#login) call

module.name: module
module.description: the module the prepay is for. use [get_modules](#get_modules) to get a list of modules

amount.name: amount
amount.description: the dollar amount of prepay total

automatic_use.name: automatic_use
automatic_use.description: whether or not the prepay will get used automatically by billing system.

api_add_prepay.input_comment:
* @param sid string the *Session ID* you get from the [login](#login) call
* @param module string the module the prepay is for. use [get_modules](#get_modules) to get a list of modules
* @param amount float the dollar amount of prepay total
* @param automatic_use bool whether or not the prepay will get used automatically by billing system.

api_domains_get_client_invoices.name: api_domains_get_client_invoices
api_domains_get_client_invoices.description:
This Function Applies to the Domain Registrations services.
* Gets a list of all the invoices.

function.name: api_domains_get_client_invoices
function.desc:
This Function Applies to the Domain Registrations services.
Gets a list of all the invoices.

sid.name: sid
sid.description: the *Session ID* you get from the [login](#login) call

output.name: invoices_id
output.description: ID of the Invoice used for referencing

output.name: invoices_description
output.description: Description of what the Invoice was for

output.name: invoices_custid
output.description: ID of the Customer this Invoice is for

output.name: invoices_type
output.description: The Type of Invoice (1 = charge, 10+ are payment types)

output.name: invoices_group
output.description: Billing Group the Invoice falls under, Not currently used

output.name: invoices_extra
output.description: If type 1 invoice this points to the repeat invoice id, otherwise points to the id of the charge invoice its a payment for.

output.name: invoices_paid
output.description: Wether or not the Invoice was paid (if applicable)

output.name: invoices_module
output.description: Module the Invoice was for.  You can use [get_modules](#get-modules) to get a list of available modules.

output.name: invoices_service
output.description: ID of the Service/Order this Invoice is for such as 1000 if the order was vps1000 and the module was vps

api_domains_get_client_invoices.input_comment: * @param sid string the *Session ID* you get from the [login](#login) call

strPixels.name: strPixels
strPixels.description:
This function uses the array below to calculate the pixel width of a string of
* characters. The widths of each character are based on a 12px Helvetica font. 
* Kerning is not taken into account so RESULTS ARE APPROXIMATE.  The purpose is to
* return a relative size to help in formatting. For example, strPixels('I like
* cake') == 54    strPixels('I LIKE CAKE') == 67
